attributes.action: Larger fines or prison sentences to owners who don't pick up their dogs mess.
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of dog illnesses to other dogs, people and children.
attributes.background: Give larger fines or prison sentences to owners who don't pick up their dogs mess.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make it a fineable offence for dog owners not to carry bags for collecting foul
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327824
